notes: {{JSpoiler|It's part of the final fight of [[The Cradle of Monsters Quest]].}}
sounds: The secrets of live will be mine!
You will never get me! Face my greatest creation!
name: Doctor Marrow
behaviour: Attacks in close range and doesn't retarget very often.
strategy: Destroy the [[Antenna]]es in the room, otherwise they will heal him. Shooters should stay far away from the boss to avoid it's strong AoE [[Earth Damage]] attack, and the blocker should stand on a field bomb of any element to avoid running away when [[Feared]]. After Doctor Marrow takes some damage, it will run away and leave you with [[The Monster]].
